power.title: Binding Aegis
power.fluff: Your enemy is held fast by invisible magic bonds, and if it manages to escape your retribution will be swift

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature marked by your arcane aegis

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is held fast (save ends). The effect immediately ends if the target is no longed marked by your arcane aegis.

While it is held, the target is immobilized and immune to being pulled, pushed or slid. It must succeed on a saving throw to willingly teleport. You can use a free interrupt to temporarily suppress the immunity to forced movement.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: You can use a free reaction to teleport up to 10 squares to a space adjacent to the target, and use a melee at-will attack power against it.

power.title: Blade of Judgement
power.fluff: You pour arcane energy into improving your aegis

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an enemy you have marked

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport the triggering enemy to a space adjacent to you.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss (AC):
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).

power.title: Burning Blade
power.fluff: Your fiery blade lunges toward your enemy, and its arcane warmth flares again and again in the wounds of your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your Weapon attacks with the weapon you used for this attack are fiery.

While your attacks are fiery, they deal additional fire damage equal to your Strength modifier. This increases to 2 + your Strength modifier with attacks that already deal fire damage. If the attack you make does not have the Fire keyword, it gains it.
If the attack deals untyped damage or causes untyped ongoing damage, the damage becomes fire damage.
If an attack you make already has a damage type, the type becomes fire in addition to the type(s) it already has.

power.title: Dance of the Sword
power.fluff: Your dazzling display of swordplay and magic captivates your foes and causes them to neglect combat tactics and opportunities

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is captivated by your display of skill (save ends).
While captivated, the target cannot make reactive strikes or shift, and takes a -2 penalty to other triggered attack rolls.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is captivated by your display of skill until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Dimensional Thunder
power.fluff: As you pass unseen through dimensional space, you gather a thunderous roar that bombards enemies upon your arrival

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport up to 4 squares, or up to 6 squares to a space adjacent to an enemy marked by you.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Miss (AC):
section.text: Half damage. The damage is untyped if you also missed Fortitude.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: The target takes a penalty to its first saving throw against the ongoing thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each enemy adjacent to you takes ongoing thunder damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals 4 + one-half the distance you teleported (rounded up).

power.title: Dragon's Teeth Strike
power.fluff: When you strike, shards of force explode from your weapon and dig into your foes' flesh, goading them to move in your direction

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the Force Teeth attack. You must include the primary target in the blast.

section.name: Force Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and force shards are embedded in it (save ends).
While the shards are embedded, if the target is not adjacent to you at the end of its turn, it takes force damage equal to your Strength modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and force shards are embedded in it until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Frost Backlash
power.fluff: As your enemy swings for the kill, your warding suddenly turns to ice and lashes out at your with the fury of winter

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An adjacent creature hits you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence +2 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 cold damage, and you reduce the triggering attack's damage by your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Lashing Asp Stance
power.fluff: A spectral asp winds itself around your weapon hand, lunging to attack nearby creatures with each of your successful strikes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Lashing Asp stance.

Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee attack, each enemy adjacent to that enemy takes poison damage equal your Constitution modifier + the enhancement bonus of the weapon or implement you used for the attack.
Also, whenever you hit an enemy marked by your arcane aegis with a melee attack, it also takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Sweeping Frostblade
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a wide circle, unleashing a freezing wave that numbs nearby foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss (AC):
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: The target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss (Fortitude):
section.text: The target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Vanishing Blade
power.fluff: Your sudden departure after striking your foe leaves the enemy casting about to anticipate your next attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You become invisible until the end of your next turn, then teleport up to 5 squares.

Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee attack, you can teleport up 3 squares as a free reaction. If your attack is a critical hit, you can also turn invisible until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Warding Flourish
power.fluff: Fancy bladework creates a magical buffer around your enemy that keeps it away from your friends

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.

section.name: Miss (AC):
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, when an ally adjacent to the target hits it with an attack, he or she can push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot enter a square that is adjacent to any of your allies. This does not prevent it from staying in such a square if it is already in one or if an ally moves adjacent to it.

power.title: Whirlwind Blade
power.fluff: You spin and suddenly hurl your sword, causing it to spin in the air in seek of an enemy to slash

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must throw your bonded weapon as part of making this attack.

section.name: Attack:
section.range2: weapon +2/+5 if your weapon can be thrown
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, or 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage if your bonded weapon can normally be thrown.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Repeat the attack against a different creature within 5 squares of the target, calculating range normally from your space.

If you miss this second attack, you can repeat the attack against a third creature within 5 squares of the second target. If you miss this third attack, you can repeat it against a fourth creature within 5 squares of the third target.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your weapon returns to your hand.
